bibl.title: The Search for the Perfect Book: A PS to the New Posidippus.
The New Posidippus. A Hellenistic Poetry Book
bibl.author: BARCHIESI, Alessandro

bibl.note: A Roman context for Hellenistic books. - The self-conscious book and the author's authority. - Catullus, the book, and the structure of Callimachus' Aitia. - Towards a fuzzier model.
BARCHIESI Alessandro, The Search for the Perfect Book: A PS to the New Posidippus.
Kathryn GUTZWILLER (Ed.), The New Posidippus. A Hellenistic Poetry Book (Oxford, 2005) pp. 320-342.
